I am mostly seeing comments about how awful Delta Air Lines is. And I am not discrediting anyone’s experience, but I am surprised to hear… and I am just here to say that I have flown delta for years and have always had top notch flights and service. They are always my preferred airline.

they are great until they are not. I am a diamond medallion level frequent delta flier. They screwed up my family trip to Portugal (late connector) and did nothing to help get us there. I had to go to united to get a new flight. They offered me $300 credit.

our very first flight beginning of our vacation was going to be delayed which meant we were going to miss our connecting so they booked us on American Airlines and we’re standing in line getting ready to get on our plane and we double check and noticed that we’re still going to miss our connecting so we had to get out of the line and go back to the Delta desk and have them change it again making us three hours late from our original arrival!! if we hadn’t noticed it, we would’ve been stuck in Phoenix overnight??? then on our way home the first flight was normal no problems, second flight delayed, of course, and we already had a three hour layover!!
 NEVER FLY DELTA!!!

We can imagine your frustrations with this concern, and we are happy to try and help. For the best assistance possible, please check your Inbox to speak with representatives.

Unfortunately, my peace and opportunity for a break and a stress free few days has turned into an actual nightmare. Our flights got delayed. Our connections were missed, and instead of having sympathy or care for our situation the first two Delta agents we had to speak to literally yelled at us and told us there was nothing they could do to help us because the only flights available for four days were first class and under no circumstances do they offer rebookings as upgrades. They shooed us away to go pick up a desk phone to “get someone else to help” because there was nothing onsite Delta agents could do. We LITERALLY had to sit in the cold, depressing customer service lounge on the phone for four hours to find an option. The BEST option we were given was to take 5 flights to eventually reach our destination. I’m optimistic so I agreed. After two days of travel we arrived despite being humiliated that our connecting flights sky club lounge doesn’t accept stamped boarding passes any longer to honor 24 hour access. Then we arrived to our destination only to find that we will spend ANOTHER day without our clothes.

I am writing to formally demand compensation for what can only be described as an absolute disaster of a travel experience on 03/10 and 03/11 2025.
